resources.string:
1. At the beginning of the game, the player is given 500 points.
2. The rate is selected by pressing the button "Bet".
3.The amount of the reward from the bet made:
 *2 (3 coincidences), *3 (4 coincidences), *4 (5 coincidences).
4. The game ends either by the button "Menu", or when the players funds are exhausted.
You have depleted your points balance!
